title: Computer Music II
description: (Formerly MUS 161.) Computer synthesis techniques including wavetable and additive synthesis, waveshaping, and sampling. Transformation of musical sounds using filters, modulation, and delay effects. Fourier analysis of sounds. Prerequisites: MUS 171 (formerly MUS 160C); music majors, ICAM-music and ICAM-visual arts majors and minors, or consent of instructor.
